name: Test Helmet
description: Comprehensive test helmet with wisdom bonus
tooltip: You gain 5% critical chance while wearing this armor.
Your magic resist is increased by 15% while wearing this armor.
You gain +2 magic accuracy while wearing this armor.
Your CHA bonus is decreased by 1 while wearing this armor.
Your INT bonus is increased by 2 while wearing this armor.
Your WIS bonus is increased by 3 while wearing this armor.
You take 5% more darkness damage while wearing this armor.
You take 10% less light damage while wearing this armor.
